string.text: Raise Money to Join Freedom
Lukash wants 15,000 RU to let you join Freedom.
Ah, good. You will enjoy joining Freedom. Just pay the 15,000 RU fee and you're in.
Excellent. Welcome to Freedom, bro.
Repel Assault on Freedom Base
Intercept the %s closing in on the Freedom base. Clear the area and report back to Lukash.
%s are moving in on our camp. I need someone capable to repel the incursion. Are you the man for the job?
You stopped them? Thank you stalker.
Recapture Territory for Freedom
You have been tasked to recapture a Freedom camp. Report back to Lukash after the job is done.
I have an important mission if you are willing. Duty has taken over one of our camps and I need an infiltrator to reclaim it.
Excellent. Well done.
Capture Monolith Member
Lukash has tasked you with finding and capturing %s called %s. The target must be brought in alive.

I have a very dangerous mission. I've asked for volunteers but so far no one has stepped forward. I need someone to take a Monolith cultist prisoner. Before you agree, know that no one has ever captured a Monolith member alive. Do you think you can be the first?
I've encountered a few cultists before. I know how to handle them.

Yes, we all know how to kill them, but I need one brought in alive. There is one I noticed during a recent battle that seems like he may not be fully converted to the cult, you may be able to convince him to come along with you. Try administering an injection of hot lead into his calf muscle, that can be very persuasive.
Excellent work. Hopefully we can get some useful information out of him before he finds a way to kill himself. Here is your payment.
Assassinate Duty Member
Lukash has tasked you with finding and eliminating %s called %s.
There is a certain individual who has been very loud in his opposition to Freedom and needs to be quieted. Are you any good at shutting people up?
Great! You do us proud. Here is what I promised:
%s Gun Runner
Lukash has asked you to find a %s. Return to him when you find it.
None

With Duty to the south of us and Monolith to the north, we are cut off. Our weaponry is wearing out and we need replacements. I'm looking for a gun runner to get us a new %s. If you are able to do it, I would be willing to pay a good price for it.
Well done. This will go a long way in helping us defend the Zone. Here is the payment I promised.
Eliminate the Enemy Threat
%s have been spotted in the area. Meet up with the advance team of Freedom scouts and repel the invaders.
Eliminate the hostile %s.
Our scouts have sighted a group of %s heading this way. Go reinforce the scouts and repel the attack.
Hey, %s is here to help! Come on, the enemy force is just over the rise, let's clear them out.
Thank you for your help, you are a fine warrior indeed. Take this as your reward.
